## DateApiObject.isSameWeek() method

Compares whether this date is same week as provided date

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isSameWeek(date: TDate): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  date | TDate | Date which is used for comparison of same week |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
